member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.AddFuncDesc
member.summary: Adds a function description to the type description.
member.param: The index of the new FUNCDESC in the type information.
A FUNCDESC structure that describes the function. The bstrIDLInfo field in the FUNCDESC should be null.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more of the arguments is not valid.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.AddImplType
member.summary: Specifies an inherited interface, or an interface implemented by a component object class (coclass).
member.param: The index of the implementation class to be added. Specifies the order of the type relative to the other type.
A handle to the referenced type description obtained from the AddRefType description.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more of the arguments is not valid.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.AddRefTypeInfo
member.summary: Adds a type description to those referenced by the type description being created.
member.param: The type description to be referenced.
The handle that this type description associates with the referenced type information.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more of the arguments is not valid.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.AddVarDesc
member.summary: Adds a variable or data member description to the type description.
member.param: The index of the variable or data member to be added to the type description.
A pointer to the variable or data member description to be added.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more of the arguments is not valid.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.DefineFuncAsDllEntry
member.summary: Associates a DLL entry point with the function that has the specified index.
member.param: The index of the function.
The name of the DLL that contains the entry point.
The name of the entry point or an ordinal (if the high word is zero).

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more of the arguments is not valid.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.LayOut
member.summary: Assigns VTBL offsets for virtual functions and instance offsets for per-instance data members, and creates the two type descriptions for dual interfaces.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
The state of the type library is not valid for this operation.
More than one item exists with this name.
The type information is too long.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.SetAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the data alignment for an item of TYPEKIND=TKIND_RECORD.
member.param: Alignment method for the type. A value of 0 indicates alignment on the 64K boundary; 1 indicates no special alignment. For other values, n indicates alignment on byte n.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
The state of the type library is not valid for this operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.SetDocString
member.summary: Sets the documentation string displayed by type browsers.
member.param: A brief description of the type description.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
The state of the type library is not valid for this operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.SetFuncAndParamNames
member.summary: Sets the name of a function and the names of its parameters to the specified names.
member.param: The index of the function whose function name and parameter names are to be set.
An array of pointers to names. The first element is the function name. Subsequent elements are names of parameters.
The number of elements in the rgszNames array.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more of the arguments is not valid.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo.SetFuncDocString
member.summary: Sets the documentation string for the function with the specified index.
member.param: The index of the function.
The documentation string.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more of the arguments is not valid.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.
Insufficient memory to complete the operation.

The Help context ID for the Help topic.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ICreateTypeInfo
member.summary: Provides the tools for creating and administering the type information defined through the type description.
